AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Raymond McMillon: individual being questioned by Agent Pena, passenger in the tractor-trailer, attempted to pull down the fold-up bed, charged with conspiracy to transport aliens within the United States, filed a motion to dismiss the indictment on speedy trial grounds, sentenced to 41 months' imprisonment, argues about the lawfulness of Agent Pena's immigration questions, claimed to have a possessory interest in the tractor-trailer
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Zeba Williams: individual being questioned by Agent Pena, driver of the tractor-trailer, gave consent for the search, charged with conspiracy to transport aliens within the United States
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Luis Pena: Government agent who questioned Williams and McMillon, asked for consent to search the tractor's sleeper area, testified at the jury trial, asked immigration questions, conducted a checkpoint stop within a permissible duration, initiated the search of the tractor-trailer
